name: Gameboy Advance Video Twisted Metal Small Brawl PS1 Cutscenes
name_original: Gameboy Advance Video Twisted Metal Small Brawl PS1 Cutscenes
description:
Would you like a nice,brutal toy with rockets flying to other cars shooting bullet and guns pointing to rest of kids competition ?

Come to see a nostalgic game from Playstation 1 of classic Twisted Metal franchises: a combat racing game customized with weapons,special attacks,  (For Kids) selecting any kid characters with there own RC toy car for fun and carnage. 

Twisted Metal: Small Brawl!

Now you´l see is the PS1 video cutscenes in Gameboy Advance video cutscenes!

Hope you like it ,share with your friends,like it and check my other gba video series!
